title: ECB President Lagarde Calls For Firm Safeguards on Foreign Stablecoins
summary: ECB President Lagarde stresses need for stablecoins to adhere to EU regulations before operating in the region.

body.raw:
![ECB President Lagarde Calls For Firm Safeguards on Foreign Stablecoins](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/s3y3vcno/production/43783b3a660eab465b4b5ad89269eefc900cc2fd-1500x864.jpg?auto=format&w=1920&h=1080&crop=focalpoint&fit=clip)

ECB President Lagarde stresses need for stablecoins to adhere to EU regulations before operating in the region.

---
